title: Ping Spammers Put Me On Tilt.
body: Please let me mute these scum, I don't care what they have to say.

replies.body: Just go to settings and lower the sound of pings. Also if it's happening often enough to make a post about then you're probably doing something wrong.
He probably blew up about something small

>Also if it's happening often enough to make a post about then you're probably doing something wrong.

Not at all, some people just over use the things and it's EVERYONE that hears it, not just say the mid laner that's ignoring it while your in top lane.
The high pitch hurts my ears when it's repeatedly spammed. Thank you.
Nobody cares what you have to say.
Thank you for speaking for everyone.
You're on my friendslist, or were.
